abilities.name: Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Spark
about: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
about: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning

abilities.name: Conductivity Zone
about: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and gives damage hit more chance to shock
